meanings.definition: The quality of being sticky or adhesive.
meanings.sent1: The gumminesses of the tape made it perfect for sticking things together.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't open the envelope due to the gumminesses of the seal.
meanings.sent3: The gumminesses of the candy caused it to get stuck in my teeth.
meanings.sent4: The gumminesses of the glue held the pieces firmly in place.
meanings.sent5: The gumminesses of the syrup made it difficult to pour smoothly.

meanings.definition: The state of being gummy or chewy.
meanings.sent1: The gumminesses of the taffy made it enjoyable to chew.
meanings.sent2: The gumminesses of the bread made it hard to swallow.
meanings.sent3: The gumminesses of the bubblegum made it fun to blow bubbles.
meanings.sent4: The gumminesses of the caramel made it a sticky treat.
meanings.sent5: The gumminesses of the jelly made it wobble on the plate.

meanings.definition: The tendency to stick together or clump.
meanings.sent1: The gumminesses of the dough made it hard to separate into pieces.
meanings.sent2: The gumminesses of the rice caused it to form clumps in the pot.
meanings.sent3: The gumminesses of the stickers made them hard to peel off.
meanings.sent4: The gumminesses of the wet sand made it perfect for building sandcastles.
meanings.sent5: The gumminesses of the paint caused the brushes to stick together.
